headline: GE Vernova shares rise as Trump, governors push for PJM power auction
summary: Investing.com -- GE Vernova shares rose 3.7% in pre-market trading Friday after reports that President Trump and governors from PJM Interconnection states will announce plans for an emergency wholesale electricity auction aimed at addressing power reliability and affordability concerns.

content.title: GE Vernova shares rise as Trump, governors push for PJM power auction
content.summary: Investing.com -- GE Vernova shares rose 3.7% in pre-market trading Friday after reports that President Trump and governors from PJM Interconnection states will announce plans for an emergency wholesale electricity auction aimed at addressing power reliability and affordability concerns.

headline: Constellation Energy Corporation (CEG) Is Considered a Good Investment by Brokers: Is That True?
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for Constellation Energy Corporation (CEG) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?

content.title: Constellation Energy Corporation (CEG) Is Considered a Good Investment by Brokers: Is That True?
content.summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for Constellation Energy Corporation (CEG) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?

headline: Trump threatens tariffs over Greenland, addresses AI power costs
summary: Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Brooke DiPalma tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including President Trump's latest comments about placing tariffs on countries that disagree with the proposed US annexation of Greenland and how shares of energy companies Vistra (VST), Constellation Energy (CEG), and GE Vernova (GEV) are reacting to the administration's proposals to help lower power casts as Big Tech plan AI data center projects. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

content.title: Trump threatens tariffs over Greenland, addresses AI power costs
content.description:
Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Brooke DiPalma tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including President Trump's latest comments about placing tariffs on countries that disagree with the proposed US annexation of Greenland and how shares of energy companies Vistra (VST), Constellation Energy (CEG), and GE Vernova (GEV) are reacting to the administration's proposals to help lower power casts as Big Tech plan AI data center projects.

Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Indexes Turn Positive as Stocks Fight for Gains
summary: Stocks were fighting for slight gains on Friday. The S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite were both up 0.1% after trading sideways for much of the session. The Dow was also up 41 points, or 0.1%. Just about half the stocks in the S&P 500 were on the rise.

content.title: Indexes Turn Positive as Stocks Fight for Gains
content.summary: Stocks were fighting for slight gains on Friday. The S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite were both up 0.1% after trading sideways for much of the session. The Dow was also up 41 points, or 0.1%. Just about half the stocks in the S&P 500 were on the rise.
